#Omikuji2026 #NewYear

daikichi: The best fortune! It's your chance to try something new!
Your wishes will come true. Move forward without hesitation.
Someone you've been waiting for will come. Expect wonderful encounters.
Your financial luck is rising. You might receive unexpected income.
Good health fortune. You can be active and energetic.
chukichi: Your fortune is on the rise.
This is the time when your efforts bear fruit.
Good travel fortune. Why not take a short trip?
Studying hard will bring good results.
shokichi: Small happiness will come to you.
It's important to build up steadily without rushing.
Stay healthy and things will go smoothly.
kichi: You can spend a peaceful day.
Maintaining the status quo will bring good fortune.
Consult with those around you when in trouble.
Moderate exercise will boost your luck.
suekichi: Now is the time to endure. Fortune will open up eventually.
Haste makes waste. Be careful in your actions.
Good things will happen if you contact old friends.
Clean your room for a change of pace.
Small kindness will bring good fortune.
kyo: Don't push yourself. Watch and wait for now.
Unexpected expenses may occur. Keep your wallet tight.
Fatigue tends to accumulate. Rest early.
daikyo: The calm before the storm. Act with caution.
Keep your self-assertion modest. Listen to others.
Health first. Review your demanding schedule.
It's darkest before dawn. Morning will surely come.

daikichi.wish: Your wishes will come true as you desire.
daikichi.waitingPerson: Good news! They will come soon.
daikichi.lostItem: It will be found. Try looking in high places.
daikichi.health: Excellent condition. Your body can handle anything.
daikichi.love: A fateful encounter awaits. Be proactive.

chukichi.wish: It will come true, but don't let your guard down.
chukichi.waitingPerson: They will come. Look forward to it.
chukichi.lostItem: Hard to find, but it will appear.
chukichi.love: Good encounters may happen. Be natural.

shokichi.waitingPerson: They will come. Wait for contact.
shokichi.business: Good fortune if you work sincerely without rushing.

kichi.wish: It will take time to come true.
kichi.health: No problem if you don't overdo it.

suekichi.business: Better not to pursue profits now.
suekichi.study: Time to be patient. It will bloom later.

kyo.business: Be careful not to incur losses.
kyo.study: In a slump. Try changing your mood.
kyo.health: Watch out for poor health. Act early.
kyo.love: Better to watch quietly for now.

daikyo.wish: It might be best to give up.
daikyo.study: Start from basics as if starting over.
